creator: Free Books Studio
descriptionHtml:
Listen & read free books. This free app contain thousands of free books and audiobooks. Browse the most popular free books, search and find a book you love. Download free books to read offline.

Free books
You can download free books. Now the app contains thousands of free e-books and there will be more!

Free audio books
Now you can listen to audio books in the car or any other situation because many free books also have a version of audiobooks. Every audio book can be downloaded and listen to without internet access.

Book reader
Use a great book reader to read free book. It is very easy to use. Read quickly and change the font size, margins and colors.

Eye-friendly
Book reader have night mode function to protect your eyes when read at night. Turn night mode to protect your eyes. Dark theme of the app and the ability to customize the font size does not strain your eyes.

Note: all books and audio books come from the public domain
descriptionShort: Thousands Free Books and Audiobooks. Listen & read books for free on book reader

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
2.9
🐞 Fixed lost files bug on some devices
2.8
📖 Added pages number in Ebook Reader!
🔎 Last reading position not saved bug fixed
🐞 Fixed bugs in reader
2.6
🔗 Share books & audiobooks with friends!
2.5
😍 LESS ADS!
❗❗❗ We removed some ads for better user experience!

🚀Books in your LANGUAGE!
Added support for few additional languages. More free books and other languages soon!
🚀More free books & Audiobooks in categories!! Bye-bye limit of 50 titles

Listen & read free books. This free app contain thousands of free books and audiobooks. Browse the most popular free books, search and find a book you love. Download free books to read offline.

Free books
You can download free books. Now the app contains thousands of free e-books and there will be more!

Free audio books
Now you can listen to audio books in the car or any other situation because many free books also have a version of audiobooks. Every audio book can be downloaded and listen to without internet access.

Book reader
Use a great book reader to read free book. It is very easy to use. Read quickly and change the font size, margins and colors.

Eye-friendly
Book reader have night mode function to protect your eyes when read at night. Turn night mode to protect your eyes. Dark theme of the app and the ability to customize the font size does not strain your eyes.

Note: all books and audio books come from the public domain
descriptionShort: Thousands Free Books and Audiobooks. Listen & read books for free on book reader

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
4.3
🐞 Fixed some bugs
4.0
🎵 New better Audiobooks Player
3.1
🕵️ Add Arsène Lupin books colection
3.0
📙 New Sherlock Holmes books & audiobooks category!
2.8
📖 Added pages number in Ebook Reader!
2.5
😍 LESS ADS!
❗❗❗ We removed some ads for better user experience!

🚀Books in your LANGUAGE!
Added support for few additional languages. More free books and other languages soon!
🚀More free books & Audiobooks in categories!! Bye-bye limit of 50 titles

title:
Unlimited Books & Audiobooks
5.1.5

creator: Books & Audiobooks Studio
descriptionHtml:
Experience free books and audiobooks like never before with our app, your portal to audible stories Dive into the Ultimate Free Reading Apps Experience: Free Books and Audiobooks Awaiting Your Discovery!


Unlock the door to endless literary adventures with our app, the definitive choice for those who love to listen to books free and immerse themselves in captivating stories and insightful knowledge. Whether you're on the go or cozy at home, our free ebook downloader feature ensures your favorite books are always with you.

Why Choose Our App?

Extensive Library
Explore thousands of free books and free audiobooks across various genres. From mesmerizing mysteries and romantic tales to engaging self-help material and delightful children's stories, find everything you need for your reading and listening pleasure.

Perfect for Learning
Our collection of free audiobooks is ideal for those looking to listen to books free to enhance their language skills, making learning English or any new subject a breeze.

User-Friendly
As one of the best free reading apps, we offer an intuitive interface that makes finding your next read simple. Plus, our free ebook downloader lets you easily save titles for offline enjoyment.
Tailored Listening Experience: Listen to books free at your preferred pace. Our app allows you to adjust playback speed and offers other customizable features to enhance your listening experience.

Discover and Download with Ease
Our app isn't just a library; it's a haven for book lovers everywhere. With our free reading apps, you have instant access to a vast selection of free books and free audiobooks. Use our free ebook downloader to keep your favorite stories close at hand, whether you're connected to the internet or not.

Engage with a Community of Readers
Join a global community of literature enthusiasts who share your passion. Whether you're discussing the latest free books, sharing tips on where to find the best free audiobooks, or exploring new genres together, our app brings book lovers closer.

Ready to Transform Your Reading Experience? Download our app now and start enjoying the benefits of free reading apps. Dive into the world of free books and free audiobooks today, and let your literary adventure begin!
descriptionShort: Thousands of Books & Audiobooks. Download, listen and read books on book reader
